title: Calorie Count in In-N-Out Hamburger
meta_description: Discover the calorie count in n out hamburger, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, and tweaks for custom orders like Animal Style.
assumptions: Standard In-N-Out hamburger: beef patty, bun, lettuce, tomato, onion, spread; no cheese or customizations.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, exact preparation, customizations, and portion sizes. Check In-N-Out's official app or site for latest info.

quick_answer.text: One standard In-N-Out hamburger has about 390 calories and 16 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison with fast-food labels.

tweaks.label: Animal Style (add cheese, grilled onions, extra spread)
Protein Style (lettuce wrap instead of bun)

faqs.q: What is the calorie count in n out cheeseburger?
faqs.a: About 480 calories for a standard In-N-Out cheeseburger.

faqs.q: How many calories in an In-N-Out Double-Double?
faqs.a: Around 670 calories for the standard Double-Double with cheese.

faqs.q: Are In-N-Out fries high in calories?
faqs.a: Yes, a regular order of In-N-Out fries has about 395 calories.

faqs.q: What about calorie count in n out shake?
faqs.a: A chocolate shake at In-N-Out is approximately 580 calories.

faqs.q: How does customizing affect calorie count in n out burgers?
faqs.a: Add-ons like cheese or extra patties increase calories; swaps like protein style reduce them by removing the bun.
